extendedInfo.description: Turn your smartphone into a Comprehensive Finance Calculator, Today!DS Financial Calculator enables the user to do major financial calculation  which are slightly complex in nature very easily.Calculator features include:* Internal Rate of Return* Annuity Payment (AP)* Time value of Money* Net Present Value (NPV)* Future Value (FV)* Present Value(PV)* Currency and SDR Converter* Loan Amortization Schedule* Depreciation Calculator* Standard Deviation Calculator & Calculations* Beta Function Calculator* Gamma Function Calculator
